snippet.title: Buck Rogers - Countdown to Doomsday (1990) PC FPA Adventure
snippet.description:
╔═════════ஜ۩☢۩ஜ═════════╗
►║|   OPEN ME FOR MORE INFOS   |║◄
╚═════════ஜ۩☢۩ஜ═════════╝

On this channel you will find tons of first person games as an archive for ALL first person games ever published is created here. The videos show you the first 15-30 minutes of gameplay without any comment, as I don't want to influence anyone with my opinion. If you like a game, I almost always have links in the info box where you can get the game (legal) without much searching. If you like the channel, you are welcome to leave me a subscription. THX

Buck Rogers - Countdown to Doomsday (1990) PC FPA Adventure

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

►Info:◄
http://www.mobygames.com/game/buck-rogers-countdown-to-doomsday

http://ogdb.eu/index.php?section=title&titleid=5146

https://www.igdb.com/games/buck-rogers-countdown-to-doomsday


*►Other First Person Games from the developers "Strategic Simulations":◄*

Pool of Radiance (1988)
https://youtu.be/3qn-qX4oLAk

Curse of the Azure Bonds (1989)
https://youtu.be/_txXQdhVn-E

Secret of the Silver Blades (1990)
https://youtu.be/sVYX67L6kXs

Buck Rogers - Countdown to Doomsday (1990)
https://youtu.be/80LE5CzxGy4 🇺🇸
https://youtu.be/duMfLic-BOI 🇩🇪 

Champions of Krynn (1990)
https://youtu.be/-7cgQA83GrU

Pools of Darkness (1991)
https://youtu.be/aKtat7e4poM 🇺🇸 
https://youtu.be/P8dGWcUIt_c 🇩🇪

Death Knights of Krynn (1991)
https://youtu.be/sfowsW8Mggs 🇩🇪

Buck Rogers - Matrix Cubed (1992)
https://youtu.be/NG-J4u_-uM0 🇺🇸
https://youtu.be/k4HsJtXcNtI 🇩🇪 

Eye of the Beholder 3 - Assault on Myth Drannor (1993)
https://youtu.be/mW2vqS5IjNA 🇺🇸
https://youtu.be/rLUGUY_ngrg 🇩🇪 
 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

►The Hall:◄ --- German/Deutsch
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw/playlists?view=50&sort=dd&shelf_id=3

►The Hall:◄ --- English
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw/playlists?view=50&sort=dd&shelf_id=2

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

►Gameplay:◄
5:47

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

►You can get the game here:◄

Amazon Germany (Affiliate link):
https://amzn.to/3l2LF7g
https://amzn.to/3f34xPv

Amazon U.S. (Affiliate link):
https://amzn.to/3i550T9

eBay Germany (Affiliate link):
https://ebay.us/bt7jJj

eBay U.S. (Affiliate link):
https://ebay.us/WfZXN7

Affiliate links: If you buy something through these links, I get a small commission without the price changing for you. This way you can support this channel if you want

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

►Hall Support:◄

My Channel Supporter:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw/join

Abo / Sub:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw?sub_confirmation=1

G2A (Affiliate link) :
https://www.g2a.com/r/gr-5e68d48b2d24e
